item.description:
This meetup is at Waterplace's monthly "Vino Versity", and this month's theme is spicy wines. You get 6 wine tastings and light food pairings for only $10. Please bring cash to this event.

There is complimentary valet at Waterplace.

Also, every Tuesday is half price off of all wines at Waterplace, so we can stay later and drink some more wine. This is a great deal!

As an icebreaker activity, I am asking everyone to send me 2 little-known/strange facts and 1 lie about yourself. I will print these out and we'll see if we can guess which are the truths!
item.how_to_find_us: look for the tiny Asian woman or call my cell [msg me to get it]
item.name: Spicy Wine Tasting @ Waterplace Restaurant
